snippet: After Colby, the golden retriever, recently died in a drying cage at one of its Virginia locations, the pet supplies company released a statement disclosing findings from an internal investigation.
abstract: Petco accepts full responsibility for death of Colby, golden retriever that died during grooming session at store in Midlothian, Va; internal investigation found that groomer had not followed protocol in using a drying kennel, but company denies that excessive heat was cause; incident has resulted in widespread scorn on social media.
lead_paragraph: After Colby, the golden retriever, recently died in a drying cage at one of its Virginia locations, the pet supplies company released a statement disclosing findings from an internal investigation.

headline.main: Petco Takes ‘Full Responsibility’ for Retriever’s Death, but Says Heat Was Not the Cause
headline.print_headline: Petco Takes ‘Full Responsibility’ for Retriever’s Death, but Says Heat Was Not the Cause
